reviews.title: What Our Detectives Say
reviews.subtitle: Experiences from investigators who have already solved cases

review1.text: The cases are incredibly well-researched, and the AI makes investigating a real experience. Inspector Kruger always makes me smile!

review2.text: I've tried many detective games, but none are as immersive as DetectivesGame. The premium cases are worth every penny!

review3.text: The ability to question witnesses and analyze evidence feels like being in a real crime drama. Absolutely addictive!
